phrs.translation: 较差的, 更穷, 越来越穷
贫富之间, 为了更富或更穷, 不管怎么样

sentences.sentence: It's among the poorer countries of the world.
sentences.translation: 它是世界上的贫穷国家之一。

sentences.sentence: There are many ways to increase agricultural efficiency in the poorer areas of the world.
sentences.translation: 有许多提高世界较贫困地区农业效能的方法。

sentences.sentence: Schools with better reputations will be flooded with applications while poorer schools will be left high and dry.
sentences.translation: 声誉好些的学校将会收到大量申请，而差些的学校则将陷入困境。
